results.user_query: "Hi there! Could you please tell me your store hours and location? I'm planning to visit soon and want to make sure I have the details right. Thanks!"
results.bot_response:
Hey there! That's awesome to hear you're planning to visit JO's Bike Shop – we can't wait to have you roll in! 🚲🔧 Our shop is located at 456 Pedal Lane in beautiful Portland, OR 97201.

As for our store hours, we're open 7 days a week to serve all your biking needs:
- Monday to Wednesday: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM
- Thursday & Friday (hey, let's pedal into the evening!): 9:00 AM - 7:00 PM
- Saturday: 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM
- Sunday: 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM

We've got your back whether you need a basic tune-up, a full-service overhaul, or even a custom dream bike build! And if you're into expert bike fitting, vintage resto projects, or those zippy e-bikes, we've got specialties for days! 🛠️

Don't worry about parking – we've got free spots in our lot and bike racks up front. Plus, our shop is wheelchair accessible to ensure every biking enthusiast feels right at home!

Feel free to swing by whenever suits you best. Whether you're a weekend warrior, a daily commuter, or a competitive racer, JO's has your back and your bike! Pedal on over soon! 🌟🚴‍♂️

results.user_query: "Hi there! Could you please tell me your store hours and location? I'm planning to visit sometime soon. Thanks!"
results.bot_response:
Absolutely, greetings fellow rider! 🚴‍♂️🌟 JO's Bike Shop is located at 456 Pedal Lane in beautiful Portland, OR 97201. You can easily reach us at (503) 555-BIKE or shoot us an email at info@josbikeshop.com. Our website, www.josbikeshop.com, is also a great resource for all things biking!

When you're ready to pedal over, here are our hours:
- Monday to Wednesday: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM
- Thursday to Friday: 9:00 AM - 7:00 PM (extended hours for your after-work needs 🌆)
- Saturday: 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM
- Sunday: 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM

We are pumped you're considering stopping by soon! Remember, we're open 7 days a week to keep you rolling smoothly. See you at JO's Bike Shop! 🚲✨

results.user_query: "Hey, I was wondering if you could tell me about your return policy on bikes? I got a call, can you hold on a sec?"
results.bot_response: Of course! Our return policy on bikes is as follows: if you are not satisfied with your purchase, you may return the bike within 30 days for a full refund. The bike must be in its original condition and packaging. We also offer a warranty on all our bikes for any manufacturing defects. As for delivery, we offer free shipping on all bike orders within the continental US. If you have any further questions, feel free to ask once you're ready.

results.user_query: "Hey, sorry I might have missed it but could you tell me if there's a return policy for bikes if they're not quite what I expected? Like within a certain timeframe or something?"
results.bot_response: Of course! Our shop has a 30-day return policy for bikes that are not quite what you expected. Just be sure to keep the original packaging and proof of purchase. If you have any other questions, feel free to ask.

results.user_query: Can I cancel my bike order if I've changed my mind?
results.bot_response: Our shop policy allows for cancellations within 24 hours of placing your order. If you have changed your mind after this time period, please contact us as soon as possible to discuss your options. Thank you.

results.user_query: Can you tell me about your return policy?
results.bot_response: Certainly! Our return policy allows for returns within 30 days of purchase, as long as the item is in its original condition and packaging. We offer full refunds or exchanges for any defective or damaged items. Please note that return shipping costs may apply. If you have any further questions or concerns, please feel free to reach out to our customer service team.
